00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.Collections;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 
00027 using NyFolder;
00028 using NyFolder.GUI;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00032 
00033 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.DownloadManager {
00034     public class UploadViewer : FrameViewer {
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PUBLIC Events
00037         // ============================================
00038 
00039         // ============================================
00040         // PROTECTED Members
00041         // ============================================
00042 
00043         // ============================================
00044         // PRIVATE Members
00045         // ============================================
00046 
00047         // ============================================
00048         // PUBLIC Constructors
00049         // ============================================
00050         public UploadViewer() {
00051             UploadManager.SendedPart += new BlankEventHandler(OnSendedPart);
00052             UploadManager.Finished += new BlankEventHandler(OnFinished);
00053             UploadManager.Aborted += new BlankEventHandler(OnAborted);
00054             UploadManager.Added += new BlankEventHandler(OnAdded);
00055         }
00056 
00057         ~UploadViewer() {
00058             UploadManager.SendedPart -= new BlankEventHandler(OnSendedPart);
00059             UploadManager.Finished -= new BlankEventHandler(OnFinished);
00060             UploadManager.Aborted -= new BlankEventHandler(OnAborted);
00061             UploadManager.Added -= new BlankEventHandler(OnAdded);
00062         }
00063 
00064         // ============================================
00065         // PUBLIC Methods
00066         // ============================================
00068         public void Clear() {
00069             lock (progressObjects) {
00070                 Hashtable rm = new Hashtable();             
00071                 foreach (FileSender fileSender in progressObjects.Keys) {
00072                     FileProgressObject obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileSender];
00073                     if (obj.Finished == true) {
00074                         obj.Delete -= new BlankEventHandler(OnButtonDelete);
00075                         rm.Add(fileSender, obj);
00076                     }
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 foreach (FileSender fileSender in rm.Keys) {
00080                     progressObjects.Remove(fileSender);
00081                     vbox.Remove((FileProgressObject) rm[fileSender]);
00082                 }
00083                 rm.Clear();
00084                 rm = null;
00085             }
00086         }
00087 
00088         // ============================================
00089         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00090         // ============================================
00091         private void OnAdded (object sender) {
00092         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00093             FileSender fileSender = sender as FileSender;
00094 
00095             FileProgressObject obj = new FileProgressObject();
00096             obj.Delete += new BlankEventHandler(OnButtonDelete);
00097 
00098             // Setup Image
00099             string ext = FileUtils.GetExtension(fileSender.Name);
00100             obj.Image = StockIcons.GetFileIconPixbuf(TextUtils.UpFirstChar(ext));
00101 
00102             // Set Transfer Info
00103             SetTransferInfo(obj, fileSender);
00104             
00105             // Set Info
00106             UserInfo userInfo = fileSender.Peer.Info as UserInfo;
00107             obj.SetName(fileSender.Name, userInfo.Name);
00108 
00109             // Add Update
00110             progressObjects.Add(fileSender, obj);
00111             vbox.PackStart(obj, false, false, 2);
00112             obj.ShowAll();
00113         });
00114         }
00115 
00116         private void OnAborted (object sender) {
00117         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00118             try {
00119                 FileSender fileSender = sender as FileSender;
00120                 FileProgressObject obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileSender];
00121                 SetTransferInfo(obj, fileSender);
00122                 obj.Info += " <b>ABORTED</b>";
00123                 obj.Finished = true;
00124             } catch (Exception e) {
00125                 Debug.Log("Upload Viewer Abort: {0}", e.Message);
00126             }
00127         });
00128         }
00129 
00130         private void OnFinished (object sender) {
00131         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00132             try {
00133                 FileSender fileSender = sender as FileSender;
00134                 FileProgressObject obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileSender];
00135                 obj.ProgressBar.Visible = false;
00136                 obj.Info = "<b>(Finished)</b>";
00137                 obj.Finished = true;
00138             } catch (Exception e) {
00139                 Debug.Log("Upload Viewer Finish: {0}", e.Message);
00140             }
00141         });
00142         }
00143 
00144         private void OnSendedPart (object sender) {
00145         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00146             try {
00147                 FileSender fileSender = sender as FileSender;
00148                 FileProgressObject obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileSender];
00149                 if (obj == null) {
00150                     OnAdded(sender);
00151                     obj = (FileProgressObject) progressObjects[fileSender];
00152                 } else if (obj.Finished == true) {
00153                     return;
00154                 }
00155                 SetTransferInfo(obj, fileSender);
00156             } catch (Exception e) {
00157                 Debug.Log("Upload Viewer Sended Part: {0}", e.Message);
00158             }
00159         });
00160         }
00161 
00162         private void OnButtonDelete (object sender) {
00163         Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00164             FileProgressObject obj = sender as FileProgressObject;
00165             obj.Delete -= new BlankEventHandler(OnButtonDelete);
00166 
00167             FileSender fileSender = null;
00168             lock (progressObjects) {
00169                 foreach (FileSender fileSnd in progressObjects.Keys) {
00170                     if (progressObjects[fileSnd] == obj) {
00171                         fileSender = fileSnd;
00172                         break;
00173                     }
00174                 }
00175 
00176                 if (obj.Finished != true)
00177                     fileSender.Abort();
00178 
00179                 progressObjects.Remove(fileSender);
00180                 vbox.Remove(obj);
00181             }
00182         });
00183         }
00184 
00185         // ============================================
00186         // PRIVATE Methods
00187         // ============================================
00188         private void SetTransferInfo (FileProgressObject obj, FileSender fs) {
00189             if (obj == null) return;
00190             obj.SetTransferInfo(fs.SendedSize, fs.Size, fs.SendedPercent);
00191         }
00192 
00193         // ============================================
00194         // PUBLIC Properties
00195         // ============================================
00196     }
00197 }
